caption.p: Principal component analysis (PCA) illustrating the relationships among the Zanthoxylum species ( a) and bi-plot factor analysis of the chemical components of the Zanthoxylum essential oils ( b). Abbreviations; HJ (huajiao), MKO (makwoung), MK1 (makhwaen from Mae Tang district), MK2 (makhwaen from Mae Rim district), and MK3 (makhwaen from Song Kwae district).
